title: Go Animals Go
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 44 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 50L
description: All of the animals want to go somewhere, and they all want to use something different to get there. Students will love the humorous action, such as a pig on a bike. Repeated high-frequency words and patterned text balance new vocabulary and word changes.
reviewWords: animals, bike, boat, car, cat, cow, dog, duck, go, goat, horse, pig, plane, skates, train
comprehension: Reality and Fantasy                : Identify things that are reality and fantasy
grammar: Capitalization                : Capitalize the beginning of sentences
